<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enshroud Soul Cage](/Feats.aspx?ID=3515) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 50</row>

**Archetype** [Lich](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=179)

**Prerequisites**
[Lich Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3513)

</column>

---

You wreathe your [_soul cage_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1545) in an ever-growing collection of obfuscating illusions and protective abjurations to hide it from your enemies. You disguise the _soul cage_ as any non-magical object of the  same Bulk, and it gains the effects of the [_magic aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=178) and [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) spells. The effects have unlimited durations, are heightened to half your level rounded up, and use your spell DC against any attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) them. The magic aura makes your _soul cage_ appear non-magical. You can ignore the effects of any of these spells when dealing with your own _soul cage_. You are mentally alerted whenever your _soul cage_ is damaged.
name: Enshroud Soul Cage
